value.name: Washington Post Toys With Public on Fatal Police Shootings
value.description: On Monday, April 19, Edgar Luis Tirado went on a one-man crime spree -- important details of which are not recorded in the Washington Post’s often cited "Fatal Force" database of killings by police.
